Posts.Content: I feel very alone and scared tonight. I feel pretty unwell but mostly I just want it all to stop. I miss teaching, I had to stop because I was just too tired.
Posts.Title: I am very tired. I have 5 more weekly chemo sessions left.

Posts.Content: Thank you. I fell better. It’s because the treatment t is tomorrow and I never want to go. It helps to know I am not the only one. I have not been very  good at talking to anyone and being on my own sometimes feels hard. Good luck to you too. X
Posts.Title: I am very tired. I have 5 more weekly chemo sessions left.
